alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:20PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rock Island, Whiteside, northeastern Henry, eastern Carroll and southwestern Stephenson Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Shannon to near Erie. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sterling, Rock Falls, Morrison, Prophetstown, Erie, Lanark, Milledgeville, Fairhaven, Tampico, Shannon, Lyndon, Chadwick, Coleta, Deer Grove, Emerson, Union Grove, Ustick, Fenton, Hillsdale and Round Grove. This includes Interstate 88 between mile markers 14 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Illinois.
